channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on Giulio 'peperunas' De Pasquale

item.title: Bash e Filtri (in Italian)
item.description:
I held a talk for the POuL association whose I proudly am member. Here I’ve shown to intermediate *nix users, how to move the first steps with bash and its main components.

The talk was held in Italian.
